title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: The 'Open' and 'Close' options for projects P1 and P2 are not consistently available in the Navigator.
EB: Either both 'Open' and 'Close' options for projects P1 and P2 should always be available, or neither option should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 

1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 
2. Select project P2. 
3. Close project P2.
